meaningMnemonic: When you have "troublesome" (迷惑) mail, you have mail you don't want. This is known as <vocabulary>spam</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>spam mail</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>junk mail</vocabulary>. On a more technical level it's <vocabulary>unsolicited mail</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 迷惑, so if you know that you know this (and then this vocab word won't be unsolicited as well!)
